Class StaffUI

Object
StaffUI
public class StaffUI extends Object
The StaffUI class for staff UI It interacts with staff to manage internships and process request

  • Method Details

    • menuLoop

      public void menuLoop()
      main menu, show all broad actions for staff

    • viewFilteredInternships

      private void viewFilteredInternships()
      Displays a list of internships filtered based on filter set Functionality breakdown: - Displays the filtered internships list. - Provides options for the staff to view applications of a specific internship

    • viewApplications

      private void viewApplications(List<InternshipOpportunity> filteredList)
      Allows the user to view applications for a specified internship from a filtered list. Display the internships, and enable selection and retrieves approved application for processing Provides options to return to the previous menu or handle invalid inputs.
      Parameters:
      filteredList - the list of filtered internship

    • viewPendingReq

      private void viewPendingReq(String requestType)
      Displays a list of pending requests for a specified request type and manages the requests or returning to the main menu. depending on request type, it get the relevant requests and provides options for further actions.
      Parameters:
      requestType - the type of the requests to view, such as "Rep Registration", "Internship Vetting", or "Withdrawal"

    • approveRejectReq

      private void approveRejectReq(String requestType)
      Processes the requests based on request type. The method continuously retrieves the list of pending requests of the specified type and allows the user to view details and choose to approve or reject and updates the status of selected requests accordingly.
      Parameters:
      requestType - the type of requests to manage, such as "Rep Registration", "Internship Vetting", or "Withdrawal". Determines the type of requests to fetch and the actions available for processing.
